Title: Cross-site Scripting
Description: XSS in some development error pages.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.4.0 before 3.4.14, all versions starting from 3.5.0 before 3.5.17, all versions starting from 3.6.0 before 3.6.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.4.0, all versions starting from 3.4.14 before 3.5.0, all versions starting from 3.5.17 before 3.6.0, all versions starting from 3.6.4
